channel.title: Homes on Duccio Gamannossi degl'Innocenti
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Duccio Gamannossi degl'Innocenti

item.description: Biography I am a fixed-term assistant professor at the Department of Economics and Management of the University of Padova. Previously I have been a Postdoctoral Researcher fellow at the Catholic University in Milan and at the University of Exeter. I am a member of the CIFREL (Interuniversity Research Centre on Local and Regional Finance) and an Associate Fellow of the Tax Administration Research Centre of the University of Exeter.

Teaching Office Hours: Compile this form to book an appointment Introduction to Coding - International Honors College, Ca’ Foscari University of Venice    Information about the course is on the official page on the Ca’ Foscari University website
